com.cs4310.epsilon.buynutsproto.activities

Class NewsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • com.cs4310.epsilon.buynutsproto.activities.NewsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback

    public class NewsActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    Activity that displays a list of SellOffers in a ListView that occupies most of the screen.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String DEFAULT_COMMODITY
      The default choice for a commodity; used if the activity absolutely must create a RequestFilteredSellOffer but has no commodity choice to do so.
      private MyArrayAdapter mArrayAdapter
      The ArrayAdapter object used to hold a list of SellOfferFront objects in a way that the ListView can interact with them; it allows the ListView to display them, and when a user clicks on an item in the list, this object allows the program to figure out which item the user clicked on.

      The filter set by the user, used to the backend for SellOffers

      • TAG

        private static final java.lang.String TAG
        A tag for logs, specific to this class
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_COMMODITY

        private static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_COMMODITY
        The default choice for a commodity; used if the activity absolutely must create a RequestFilteredSellOffer but has no commodity choice to do so. Without this, the constructor would fail.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REQUEST_CODE_SEARCH_FILTER

        static final int REQUEST_CODE_SEARCH_FILTER

        These are request codes, used to notify the NewsActivity which activity is sending it data.

        For example, this activity starts a new SetSearchFilterActivity when the user clicks "Set Search Filter" (using startActivityForResult), and it sends that activity the request code REQUEST_CODE_SEARCH_FILTER in an intent. When that activity finishes, the method onActivityResult() will be called, and that method needs some means of figuring out what sequence of events occurred before the start of that method.

        The request code is used to tell onActivityResult() which button the user clicked on to cause this sequence of events, so the method can respond appropriately to the data passed in the intent.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        static final int REQUEST_CODE_MAKE_OFFER

        See Also:

        Constant Field Values

      • mUid

        private long mUid
        The user ID, which is set by the MainLoginActivity when the user logs in. This value is initialized by default to an invalid user ID, so the program will know if the user reached this point in error.

      • mUnitsWt

        private java.lang.String mUnitsWt
        Preferred units of weight

        The filter set by the user, used to the backend for SellOffers

      • mListView

        private ListView mListView
        The object that displays the list of SellOfferFront objects to the user.

      • mArrayAdapter

        private MyArrayAdapter mArrayAdapter
        The ArrayAdapter object used to hold a list of SellOfferFront objects in a way that the ListView can interact with them; it allows the ListView to display them, and when a user clicks on an item in the list, this object allows the program to figure out which item the user clicked on.

      • mSellOffers

        private java.util.ArrayList<SellOfferFront> mSellOffers

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Creates the NewsActivity UI and initializes member variables; the first thing called when the app launches a NewsActivity
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Data saved from an earlier instance of this activity: only exists if the user hasn't clicked the back button

      • onActivityResult

        protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                                int resultCode,
                                Intent data)
        Runs when the user returns to this Activity from another Activity.

        If we're returning from SetSearchFilterActivity, this method will retrieve the search filter, save it, and run ListFilteredOffersAsyncTask

        If we're returning from MakeOfferActivity after making a new offer, this method will set the status message to reflect that the offer was inserted OK. It will not refresh the ListView.

        If we're returning from MakeOfferActivity after editing an old offer, this method will set the status message to reflect that the offer was edited OK. It will not refresh the ListView.

        If we're returning from ViewSellOffer, and the user has requested a new search filter from that activity, this method saves that filter and runs ListFilteredOffersAsyncTask

        Any time this activity needs to launch a new Activity, it calls '.startActivityForResult()', and sends it an integer requestCode. When that activity ends (either because it called '.finish()' on its own, or because the user clicked the back button), this method is called, and it automatically receives these parameters:

        Overrides:
        onActivityResult in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The same requestCode that this Activity sent to the new Activity when it was launched
        resultCode - Equal to Activity.RESULT_OK if the other Activity successfully sent data back to this Activity, otherwise it's something else
        data - An intent that holds any data sent to this Activity from the other Activity

      • setmSellOffers

        public void setmSellOffers(java.util.ArrayList<SellOfferFront> sellOffers)
        Used to set the list of SellOfferFront objects that this NewsActivity will display in its ListView.
        Parameters:
        sellOffers - ArrayList of SellOfferFront object to display in the ListView
